creditline: The Kelly and Geoffrey Gage Endowment for Art Acquisition
portfolio: From the series The Ache for Home (2011-2015)
signed: verso LRC in pencil: Selma Fernández Richter / Planet beneath the flag of the Karen State, / Saint Paul, MN, 2012
text: Two color photographs in the homes of Karen refugees in St. Paul, Minnesota. The first photograph shows a small boy on a mattress resting his head upon a toy fire truck. Above and behind him along the wall, a string of fairy lights traces the top edge of the wall, a flag from the Karen state, and numerous images of cars or trucks. In the second photograph, a brown toy pony with a white mane tips onto its nose on a yellow, beige, and brown floral sofa.
title: Planet beneath the flag of the Karen State, Saint Paul, MN
